title: Employee Requests Time Off
description: A staff member wants to request vacation time using the HR portal.

tasks.description: Identify the employee and check their available vacation leave balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the employee has enough accrued time for their request.

tasks.description: Guide the employee on how to submit a time-off request in the HR system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent walks the employee through the submission form.

tasks.description: Explain that the request is now pending approval from their direct manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the next step in the workflow.
